mapper.select: select F_GetTableText('t_dm_wblf_jdlx', 'code', 'name', jdlx) jdlx, F_GetTableText('t_dm_lfmd', 'code', 'name', lfmd) lfmd, F_GetTableText('t_dm_xb', 'code', 'name', tzxb) tzxb, lfid, dbtmc, lfrs, lfsj_start , lfsj_end , tlsj_start, tlsj_end, lfmd_qt , yjtm, yqxx, jfly, lp, lpsl, qkjl, fwcg, tzxm, tzgj, tzcsrq, tzgzdw, tzzc, tzzw, tzzy, tzxsly, yqcg, zqrxm, zqrdh, zqlxrxm, zqlxrdh, jdbm, yn_yqxld, yn_xyty, yn_bbssgabm, yn_bbssxcbm, status, memo, valid, create_time,operator from t_wbjd_sq where LFID = #{lfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
